name: goaldriventest
description: Ask AI to test your website with a specific goal

scripts.build: npm run clean && npx tsc && chmod +x build/GoalDrivenTest.js

scriptsComments.tsx: Use tsx to run GoalDrivenTest.ts directly. Pass it arguments after --. For example: npm run tsx -- --help
scriptsComments.prettier:check: Check if files are formatted according to prettier. Add directories or files as arguments. For example: npm run prettier:check src
scriptsComments.prettier:write: Format files according to prettier. Add directories or files as arguments. For example: npm run prettier:write src
